summary: REQ-47 appears partially implemented (the results-card sticker image src is updated), but REQ-46 is not implemented because no new static asset file was added. Due to truncation, it cannot be confirmed that the question-card sticker src was also updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded sticker image file to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename and ensure it is loadable at `/assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>.jpg`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `Added: 0` and explicitly lists no added files, so the required image asset file does not appear to have been added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` so both corner sticker `` elements (question card and results card) use the real sanitized asset path under `/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt confirms the results view uses `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg`, but the question-card portion of the file is truncated, so there is no direct evidence that the question-card `` src was also updated.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx (shows results card img src updated to `/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers-1.jpg`)
